generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and vehicles, including cars parked on the side and two pedestrians walking on the right side of the road.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the left side of the road, bordered by trees and buildings, and another sidewalk on the right side where pedestrians are walking.
- building: There are modern buildings on both sides of the road, including glass-fronted structures and concrete buildings.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and roadsides, and some greenery is present near the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, showing a partly cloudy day.
- person: Two individuals are walking on the right side of the road, each carrying a backpack.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, and a portion of a car is visible on the far right edge of the image.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (P) and a pedestrian crossing sign are visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those supporting streetlights and traffic signs.
- terrain: There is a small patch of grass and dirt visible near the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
